enWisdom: Leniency is the key to success
Leniency is the key to rightness
Gentleness blunts the edge of opposition
With leniency there is auspiciousness
Leniency leads to peace
Be lenient and you shall gain success
Through gentleness, goals are achieved
Through gentleness, companionship lasts longer

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالرِّفْقِ فَمَنْ رَفَقَ فِي أَفْعَالِهِ تَمَّ أَمْرُهُ
enWisdom: Adopt gentleness, for whoever is gentle in his actions, his matters will be [successfully] completed

Wisdom: لِنْ لِمَنْ غَالَظَكَ فَإِنَّهُ يُوشِكُ أَنْ يَلِينَ لَكَ
enWisdom: Be gentle with the one who is harsh with you, for he will soon become gentle with you
One who treats others with gentleness, gains success
One who employs leniency, prospers

Wisdom: مَنْ تَرَفَّقَ فِي الْأُمُورِ أَدْرَكَ أَرَبَهُ مِنْهَا
enWisdom: One who proceeds with leniency in his matters, acquires his objectives from them
One who employs leniency causes sustenance to flow [in abundance]

Wisdom: مِنْ عَلَامَاتِ الْإِقْبَالِ سَدَادُ الْأَقْوَالِ وَالرِّفْقُ فِي الْأَفْعَالِ
enWisdom: From the signs of turning [to Allah] are: correctness of speech and kindness in actions

Wisdom: مَا كَانَ الرِّفْقُ فِي شَيْ‏ءٍ إِلَّا زَانَهُ
enWisdom: Gentleness does not exist in anything but that it beautifies it

Wisdom: مَا اسْتُجْلِبَتِ الْمَحَبَّةُ بِمِثْلِ السَّخَاءِ وَالرِّفْقِ وَحُسْنِ الْخُلُقِ
enWisdom: Nothing brings about love like generosity, companionship and good character
There is no regret for the one who is very lenient

Wisdom: الرِّفْقُ يُيَسِّرُ الصِّعَابَ وَيُسَهِّلُ شَدِيدَ الْأَسْبَابِ
enWisdom: Leniency makes difficulties bearable and eases the harshness of situations
Through gentleness, difficulties become easy [to bear]
How many difficulties are made easy with gentleness

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَعْمَلَ الرِّفْقَ لَانَ لَهُ الشَّدِيدُ
enWisdom: Whoever employs gentleness, the hard becomes soft for him
Showing courtesy in matters makes the means [of accomplishment] easy
